'''Northlander Billet Trove''' is a one time use [[Bundle]] that allows the player to select a [[Northlander Billet]] of any weapon type:
{{Card|Northlander Sword Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Northlander Bow Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Northlander Claymore Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Northlander Catalyst Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Northlander Polearm Billet|1|show_caption=1}}
